calendar.title: Calendar Demo
calendar.description: Describe today's plans or tasks by voice. AI understands in real time and breaks them into clear tasks and steps, organizing time details directly into your calendar. No manual typing--turn scattered ideas into actionable plans with a single sentence.
bullets: Voice input instantly creates structured tasks
Automatically breaks down steps and fills in time
Calendar view is clear and easy to manage

breakdown.title: Breakdown Smart Decomposition
breakdown.description: No more manual steps for complex tasks. Describe your goal and AI breaks it into smaller action items so you can focus on the next step.
bullets: Large tasks are automatically split into clear steps
More reasonable priority and time suggestions
Reduce procrastination and start right away

starSpark.title: Star Spark Progress Highlights
starSpark.description: Star Spark automatically aggregates all unfinished tasks, turning a backlog into a clear action list. Long-press any task to let AI estimate the time and add it to your calendar with one tap for quick scheduling. Want a bit of ritual? From Star Spark you can enter the gacha page and randomly draw a task as today's challenge, making completion easier and more fun.
bullets: Unfinished tasks are automatically compiled into an action list
Long-press to estimate duration and add to calendar
Gacha random challenge to boost motivation
